Petronella Tshuma (amụrụ na 13 Jenụwarị 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Zimbabwe
O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards. Ọ nwetakwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri Golden horn kacha mma na nhọpụta maka ọrụ ya na Of Good Report
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn South Africa nke gụnyere Scandal, Hustle, Mzansi Love, Sokhulu & Partners na 90 Plein Street
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri Pearl Genaro ugbu a na etv's Rhythm City.
A mụrụ Tshuma na Zimbabwe ma ọ kwagara South Africa mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ bụ na chọọchị dị n'etiti Johannesburg na 1997 ka ọ hụrụ ime ihe nkiri n'anya, na-enweta ọrụ mbụ ya n'egwuregwu ọmụmụ Jizọs
Ka ịhụnanya ya maka ịkọ akụkọ na-eto, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Yeovill, Hillbrow na Berea.
N'afọ 2001, Petronella kwagara United Kingdom ka ya na nna ya biri na Bristol
Ọ gara Filton High School ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri, na-egwu Carmen na mmepụta nke Fame ma nata BTECH na Acting site na ngalaba SWADA nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.
